member.returns: DataTable containing a collection of matching clients.

member.name: M:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Client.Client.Fetch(System.String)

member.name: M:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Client.Client.CheckLoginSecurity(System.String)
member.summary: Determines the type code of a particular user code.
member.returns: DataTable containing a single record with one column representing the type code of the user, or no records if the user does not exist.
